main: ^I see you're thinking the exact same thing!
^It's not like that, Avery, just you know--
^No, I'd very much like to hear it.
^Well, usually when there's a newly appointed Secretary of Health and Services, it usually calls for health reformation.
^Are you kidding? The quality of our current system is terrble! The wait times are ridiculous.
^I don't even remember the last time I was able to book an appointment in the same week!
^When's the last time you had to pay for one of those checkups?
^And when's the last time ya' didn't consider evading your taxes?
^Hey, don't tell me it didn't cross your mind justa' lil'.
^I'm going to be late for work if I watch anymore.
